resources.string: If you are on the \'Today\' tab, just click Clock In/Out. If you are on the edit day window click add punch.
Long click on the punch and click \'Remove\'. If you are in the edit day window make sure to click Ok!
Long click on the punch and click \'Edit\'. If you are in the edit day window make sure to click Ok!
If you are on the \'Today\' tab click on the menu button, then click \'Edit Note\'. If you are in the edit day window just edit the text field.
Click on the tab labed \'Edit\', then click on the day. If you don\'t see the day you want to edit click on the Menu key and then \'Edit More\'.
Move to the \'View\' tab, navigate to the week you wish to send, then click the Menu key and then \'Email\'
